tool.name: SAGA.imagery_svm.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRIDS True isArrayMODEL_LOAD False isArrayROI False isArrayROI_ID False isArrayMODEL_SAVE False output_data_CLASSES $output_data_CLASSES name SAGA.imagery_svm.0 GRIDS $GRIDS SCALING $SCALING MESSAGE $MESSAGE MODEL_SRC $MODEL_SRC MODEL_LOAD $MODEL_LOAD ROI $ROI ROI_ID $ROI_ID MODEL_SAVE $MODEL_SAVE SVM_TYPE $SVM_TYPE KERNEL_TYPE $KERNEL_TYPE DEGREE $DEGREE GAMMA $GAMMA COEF0 $COEF0 COST $COST NU $NU EPS_SVR $EPS_SVR CACHE_SIZE $CACHE_SIZE EPS $EPS SHRINKING $SHRINKING PROBABILITY $PROBABILITY CROSSVAL $CROSSVAL prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.outputType_CLASSES transmissionMode_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.transmissionMode_CLASSES

param.name: GRIDS
param.label: Grids
param.help: Grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png

param.name: MESSAGE
param.label: Verbose Messages
param.help: Verbose Messages

param.name: MODEL_SRC
param.label: Model Source
param.help: Model Source

param.name: MODEL_LOAD
param.label: Restore Model from File
param.help: Restore Model from File The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: ROI
param.label: Training Areas
param.help: Training Areas The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json, xml

param.name: ROI_ID
param.label: Class Identifier
param.help: Class Identifier The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: MODEL_SAVE
param.label: Store Model to File
param.help: Store Model to File The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: SVM_TYPE
param.label: SVM Type
param.help: SVM Type

param.name: KERNEL_TYPE
param.label: Kernel Type
param.help: linear: u'*v<br/>polynomial: (gamma*u'*v + coef0)^degree<br/>radial basis function: exp(-gamma*|u-v|^2)<br/>sigmoid: tanh(gamma*u'*v + coef0)

param.name: DEGREE
param.label: Degree
param.help: degree in kernel function

param.name: GAMMA
param.label: Gamma
param.help: gamma in kernel function

param.name: COEF0
param.label: coef0
param.help: coef0 in kernel function

param.name: COST
param.label: C
param.help: parameter C (cost) of C-SVC, epsilon-SVR, and nu-SVR

param.name: NU
param.label: nu-SVR
param.help: parameter nu of nu-SVC, one-class SVM, and nu-SVR

param.name: EPS_SVR
param.label: SVR Epsilon
param.help: epsilon in loss function of epsilon-SVR

param.name: CACHE_SIZE
param.label: Cache Size
param.help: cache memory size in MB

param.name: EPS
param.label: Epsilon
param.help: tolerance of termination criterion

param.name: SHRINKING
param.label: Shrinking
param.help: whether to use the shrinking heuristics

param.name: PROBABILITY
param.label: Probability Estimates
param.help: whether to train a SVC or SVR model for probability estimates

param.name: CROSSVAL
param.label: Cross Validation
param.help: n-fold cross validation: n must > 1

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Support Vector Machine (SVM) based classification for grids.<br/>Reference:<br/>Chang, C.-C. / Lin, C.-J. (2011): A library for support vector machines. ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology, vol.2/3, p.1-27. <a target="_blank" href="http://www.csie.ntu.edu.tw/~cjlin/libsvm">LIBSVM Homepage</a>.<br/>
